page.title: 02Children's Games
page.content:
Games played by children 10yrs The following games were played by children aged 10
Ball Games..{ {football,rounders,tennis,squash,golf, {badmington,netball,tabletennis,snooker Creative Games..{ {Tents,dolls,miming,houses,mums and {dads,wars,lego,cars,dressing up Contact Games..{bulldog,40/40,999,hee {leap frog,stuck in mud Other Games.. {skating,5stones,marbles,one {knee,climbimg,walks,darts,sevens,nick- {er bocker glory,stuck in mud,knock {down ginger,video/computer games, {A/team,skipping,Bingo and kiss-chase. These were taken from a sample of 100 children during May 1985 { { }
